Statistical geneticist at the [Center for Quantitative Genetics and Genomics](https://qgg.au.dk/en/about-qgg/contact/show/person/emre@qgg.au.dk).
Developer of [NextGP.jl](https://datasciencetoolkit.github.io/NextGP.jl/stable/home/) statistical analysis package for genomic prediction.
